p: RAW264.7 cells purchased from the American Type Culture Collection were cultured according to a previously described method ( 22). The cells were maintained in DMEM/F-12 1:1 (Hyclone Laboratories Inc.) containing 10% fetal bovine serum (Gibco; Thermo Fisher Scientific, Inc.), 100 U/ml penicillin and 100 µg/ml streptomycin at 37°C under a humidified atmosphere of 5% CO 2.
